title: Santa's Obsession
description: Jenny is a Christmas baby, but that's not why Christmas is her favorite holiday. She loves the magic the holidays bring, and she loves making children happy. That's why she volunteers to work as Santa's helper down at the mall even though she doesn't need the money.But when she shows up for the gig, Santa is nothing like she thought he'd be. Old Saint Nick is anything but old and jolly. No, he's ripped and brooding, and Jenny suddenly knows exactly what she wants for Christmasâ€”and it's not more material items.
author: Emma Bray
